stanza.line: Poor soul the centre of my sinful earthearth
My sinful earth these rebel powers arrayarray
Why dost thou pine within and suffer dearthdearth
Painting thy outward walls so costly gaygay
Why so large cost having so short a leaselease
Dost thou upon thy fading mansion spendspend
Shall worms inheritors of this excessexcess
Eat up thy charge is this thy body endend
Then soul live thou upon thy servant lossloss
And let that pine to aggravate thy storestore
Buy terms divine in selling hours of drossdross
Within be fed without be rich no moremore
So shall thou feed on death that feeds on menmen
And death once dead there no more dying thenthen
